title: Wowcher has Christmas market breaks from £79pp including flights
text:

Thinking of exploring Europe's best Christmas markets this festive season? Then you may want to check out Wowcher's latest deal.

The vouchers website has teamed up with Weekender Breaks and currently has festive breaks from £79pp including a hotel stay and your return flights.

Oh, and in tribute to the 12 days of Christmas, there are 12 destinations for you to choose from; Amsterdam, Barcelona, Berlin, Budapest, Dublin, Paris, Frankfurt, Krakow, Prague, Pisa, Sofia and Warsaw.

Basically, the perfect excuse if you've been wanting to explore a new city but also want to get into the festive spirit as the Christmas countdown begins!

You can already book Wowcher's festive deal online but you'll want to be quick as the offer expires at midnight on Friday 25th October.

There's quite a generous window of travel dates to choose from, with deals valid across selected dates until the 31st December 2019.

Basically, it's the perfect opportunity to snap up a bargain if you were thinking of a long weekend away, or you've got some annual leave to use up.

There are two-night and three-night breaks up for grabs, although prices vary depending on your chosen destination and length of travel.

It's also worth noting that the cheapest deals are based on return flights from London Gatwick, London Stansted, London Luton and London Southend so if you want alternative flights, you may need to pay an extra fee.

The price is based on two people sharing a room so you'll need to buy two vouchers, but it still makes for quite a budget-friendly break.

Can't quite make the deal work for you? Don't be disheartened. We've got a guide for finding cheap Christmas market deals , while a Christmas markets cruise could also be a handy way of getting more bang for your buck.

description: Wowcher's Christmas market deal has breaks from £79pp to the likes of Berlin, Budapest and Krakow but be quick
